name: Sinners (itch)
description:
We all know how it goes - the hero wins the day, they get the love interest, and their books and movies end with happily ever after.

But what about the villain?

Could you fall in love with a sinner?

"Sinners" is an interactive romance game set in the modern day about falling in love with a customizable villain. There is one love interest and no platonic route.
